title: Honor and report
body:
I want 2 things.

**1:  The option to report players even when I've only spent pre-game chat with them.**
Reason: Sometimes people are already showing bad behaviour in pre-game chat OR they pick a different role than the one that was assigned by ranked champ select. I believe this deserves reports.

**2: The option to honor people after I left the honor screen, and after I left the end-game stats.**
Reason: Sometimes people point stuff out that I didn't think of making me willing to honor that player.
Side note: I also want to be able to honor multiple players. We can already report multiple players, so why not with honor?

I am no programmer or anything like that, but: we can see the last people we played with when trying to add new friends or start a new game. This makes me believe my wishes are possible to realize.
